eos.agent.firm
Class ConsumerGoodFirm

Object
  eos.agent.Agent
      eos.agent.firm.Firm
          eos.agent.firm.ConsumerGoodFirm
Direct Known Subclasses:
EFirm, NFirm
public abstract class ConsumerGoodFirm
extends Firm

A consumer good firm implements an enjoyment firm or a necessity firm.

Author:
zhihongx
